Nivedita BhattacharyaNivedita Bhattacharya in Cloud SevenBorn (1974-12-21) December 21, 1974 (age 46)Lucknow, Uttar PradeshNationalityIndiaOccupationActressSpouse(s)Kay Kay MenonAwardsStar Guild Award for Best Actor in a Negative Role
Nivedita Bhattacharya (born December 21, 1974) is an Indian actress. She was born in Lucknow.[1]
She is an actress who has acted on television and in films.

Contents

1 Filmography
2 Television
3 References
4 External links


Filmography[edit]
Some noted roles:

Rose (1997) - Margarita TV show (sister of the protagonist, Margarita, played by Raajeshwari)
Kya Kehna (2000) - Preity Zinta's sister-in-law
Darr @ the Mall (2014) - Tisha
Phobia (2016) - Anusha
Aiyaary (2018) - News reporter
Chicken Curry Law (2019)
